attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: I would have given zero stars if that was possible this man Is disgusting he is sexist, homophobic, xenophobic, and I rapist he should be allowed to be our president

attributes.title: worst app ever!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app so i can see what the president has to offer, and it’s horrible! first off, it’s so glitchy. i can barely do anything without my phone turning off. and you can’t even do much! this app doesn’t work and when it does, it has nothing to offer

attributes.title: Doesn’t work.
attributes.review: This app is absolutely awful. It doesn’t work, and the content is really not relevant. This is worst app I’ve EVER downloaded .

attributes.title: absolutely horrific
attributes.review: this app was terrible from the start. so hard to even find and took forever to download. very hard to access and find information. it was very laggy and just overall not appealing or interactive during use. very disappointing.

attributes.title: ✨🏳️‍🌈Bunker boy 🙈✨
attributes.review: It’s literally so bad. The graphics are terrible! It’s so pixelated that I couldn’t read anything. Do not get it!!! They even refused my service!! So much for pizza delivery

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP
attributes.review: Unbelievable, you guys scammed me of my $0.03 In my bank account! I hope this little tip pays off the starving children in YEMEN! There goes my bills for the next 3 years! ❤️🇺🇸TRUMP 2020🇺🇸❤️ BUT ON A GRAVE STONE!!! Simpson don’t fail me just yet!

attributes.title: Oompa Loompa president
attributes.review: Came here to see my Chito puff I was honestly drove to download the app because of a video I saw on tik toc plz report all the 5 start rating this is too funny

attributes.title: I hate it

attributes.review: This app make my phone glitch and I got hacked. And this app serves no purpose on making the world better.

attributes.title: Awful!!
